radiographic_examinations.findings: Dramatic new skin thickening overlying the cutaneous ulceration; a nipple BB marker was present, with adjacent air halo suggesting nipple retraction. No suspicious intraparenchymal asymmetries, calcifications, or masses.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Interval development of skin thickening compared to the previous mammogram.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Architectural distortion with an irregular, nonparallel indistinct 3-cm heterogeneous mass involving the skin, subcutaneous, and posterior soft tissues with internal vascularity; adjacent skin and subcutaneous tissues were edematous.

Skin thickening of the right breast with a 2 x 4 cm focal irregular area of extension into the underlying breast tissue; contrast-enhanced images showed enhancement of the thickened skin and associated extension into the underlying breast tissue.
